name: Dungeons & Dice (Kim Kupiainen)
description:
Dungeons & Dice is a game where you can only damage your enemies after rolling a die. Explore the dungeon and kill enemies with powerful randomized dies you can make through the power of pickups.

Movement | WASD or Arrow keys
Rolling Dice | Spacebar
Casting | Mouse 1

Keyboard & Mouse recommended for the best gaming experience. Also suggesting to download the windows version of the file over testing the WebGL for a completely bug-free experience.
